snippet: Brooklyn College’s president said two speakers from a group advocating Israel’s withdrawal from disputed territories where Palestinians live would still be allowed to appear.
abstract: Brooklyn College will still co-sponsor an event with speakers from Boycott, Divestment and Sanctions, international group advocating Israel’s withdrawal from disputed territories, despite criticism; says that as a compromise, it will host future events featuring opposing views.
lead_paragraph: Brooklyn College’s president said two speakers from a group advocating Israel’s withdrawal from disputed territories where Palestinians live would still be allowed to appear.

headline.seo: Despite Criticism, Brooklyn College Says Speakers on Israel Can Still Appear
headline.main: Amid Criticism, College Says Event on Israel Can Proceed
headline.print_headline: Amid Criticism, College Says Event on Israel Can Proceed

keywords.value: Brooklyn College, City University of New York
keywords.name: organizations
